# nel-item-collection

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                       | Type                         | Default      |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | ------------ |
| `align`     | `align`     | Horizontal alignment of items in collection       | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"` | `"vertical"` |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`  | Declare if element is disabled                    | `boolean`                    | `false`      |
| `resizable` | `resizable` | Set whether collection can be resized             | `boolean`                    | `false`      |
| `sortable`  | `sortable`  | Set whether collection is sorted (alphabetically) | `boolean`                    | `false`      |
